reviewText: everything was fair, the price, the s&h and the rapidness everything was done in, thanks, this tape gives more meaning and definition to my life, the answers I've been looking for.

Who doesn't love Mr Bill?!  But better yet about half of it is Fr. Guido and who doesn't love Fr. Guido?!  My wife I guess - I bought this at Meijer one year and I think she threw it away, so I had to replace it.  Better if it was on DVD though.

I really don't understand how this could be so awful.  Terrible writing and a early/bad CGI Mr. Bill version of "A Christmas Carol" - I mean come on, isn't Mr. Bill supposed to be primitive claymation?  There's a reason this isn't out on DVD.
